name: AtrialAblation
title: Atrial Ablation
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent atrial ablation procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure. The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a history of atrial ablation procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with codes that identify patients with a history of atrial ablation procedure. This is a grouping of ICD-10-CM and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
